Player History
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 2/15/1965 to a 2-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
Released by New York (N) on 8/14/1966...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 8/14/1966 to a 1-year deal worth $300,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by California on 3/1/1967 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 8/4/1967 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drafted in 5th round, 97th overall pick, by Detroit in 1968...
Injured on 5/24/1968 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 6/19/1968 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/27/1973 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 4-5 weeks...
Drafted in 2nd round, 27th overall pick, by Minnesota in 1976...
Injured on 6/9/1976 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 4/1/1986...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Minnesota in 1988...
